title: Breakout Pullback Entry
objective: Enter on first pullback after a confirmed breakout with volume.
entry_logic: close > donchian_high and vol_z > 2 then enter on pullback to ema20 or vwap
exit_logic: target: prior high + ATR, stop: pullback swing low
caveats: False breakouts in chop; require volume confirmation.
beginner_summary: Buy the first clean pullback after a real breakout, with volume.
assistant_hints: Wait for a close beyond the range before calling it a breakout.
Use volume z-score > 2 as a confirm.
Enter on the first pullback to EMA20/VWAP with support.
Prefer liquid tickers; avoid thin names.
